text: Rudolf Mang (17 June 1950 â€“ 12 March 2018) was a German heavyweight weightlifter. He was born in Bellenberg, Germany. He competed at the 1968 and 1972 Olympics and placed fifth and second, respectively. Between 1971 and 1972 he won four more medals at the world and European championships and set two world records: one in the snatch and one in the press.Rudolf Mang. chidlovski.net Mang died in Berlin on 12 March 2018 of a heart attack at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:Weightlifters
title: Rudolf Mang
